Class ModelFileToReceive

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • chatSystemModel.ModelFile
        • chatSystemModel.ModelFileToReceive

  • public class ModelFileToReceive
extends ModelFile
    Author:
    joanna This class represents a file received by the local user

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModelFileToReceive(java.lang.String remote, java.lang.String name, long size, int idDemand, int maxWrite)
      ModelFileToReceive constructor si le fichier existe déjà et que l'utilisateur accepte de le recevoir on ecrase le précédent contenu

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cleanFile()
      delete the file and close the OuputStream associated to this class then creates a new file with the same name and a new OutputStream for this file used when the local user wants to receive a file that exists
      void deleteFile()
      delete the file associated
      boolean getExist()
      indicates if the file to receive already exists
      java.lang.Boolean getStateReceivedDemand()
      indicates if a demand has been received
      void setStateReceivedDemand(java.lang.Boolean stateReceivedDemand)
      change the state of the demand use to notify the Gui that a demand has been received
      void writeFilePart(byte[] part, boolean isReceived)
      write a part of file in memory
